idea: Schoollog is a Saas-based product development startup with an aim to allow educational institutes to scale their IT capability faster and cheaper without setting up their own IT infrastructure. The company is actively involved in developing automation and ERP solutions for educational institute.Schoollog was founded in 2015 by IIT Ropar students Manoj Kumar and Mohit Jasapara, and later was joined by Abhishek Singh as co-founder. Schoollog is currently operating in 3 states - Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh and Haryana - and provides service to 200+ schools. The company has branch offices at Sikar, Jaipur, Hisar, Bhiwani and Mainpuri.We have just scratched the surface of how latest technology, IOT & analytics can be used to automate and streamline an institute’s operations and using a customer-centric approach, we will allow schools with minimal IT infrastructure to bring their management at par with Tier-1 schools.
name: TECHTALISMAN ENGINEERING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Cero Care Products LLP is a New Generation FMCG products Manufacturing and Trading Company. Partners of the Company are Dr. Shivani Mayakar Rao and Akash Rao. Being a combination of Dentist wife and Chemical Engineer husband we always felt the need to develop products that would make life a little easy for today’s Generation.

Along with practical applications we wanted our products to be affordable to the mass. We quickly realised that the modern Indian women not only lived in metros but throughout India. Hence making our unique products available online. The need for contemporary products was for all educated modern Indians.

Cero Product Range from
Home Care | Personal Care | Pet Care | Reagents
Selling on online from our website directly to the customer and on platforms like amazon, flipkart, snapdeal, paytm and even exporting to sell on amazon USA. 

Having travelled the world and seen the needs of present day women globally, we have engineered products for today’s India. Our aim is to strive to bring the best of innovations for our customers.

CERO is our TM (Trade Mark) registered Brand Name
name: CERO CARE PRODUCTS LLP
